property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your Commands attack your opponent and isn't blocked, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Great Mecha Kings. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play {GACHINKO JUDGE}. If you win,you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. Then you may add the bottom card of your deck to your hand ({GACHINKO JUDGE}: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy up to 3 of your opponent's creatures that have power 6000 or less. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has less power than this creature and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then you may put a non-evolution Giant creature that has less power than the chosen creature from your mana zone into the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures in the battle zone. property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
